name: ELF
description: Cornelius the Elf was living peacefully in a forest with his sweetheart Elisa. However, an evil creature known as Necrilous the Not-Very-Nice kidnapped Elisa and disappeared with her. Cornelius must embark on a perilous journey to rescue the love of his life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
